verses.1: Topa ka phat tawntung dinga, amah phatna ka gengen ding hi.
verses.2: Topa ka phat ding hi. Gimna thuakte zasak unla, lungdam uh hen.
verses.3: Kei tawh Topa nak phat un, ama min pahtawi khawm ni!
verses.4: Keimah in Topa ka zong a, amah in kei hong dawngin, ka launa khempeuh panin kei hong hon khia hi.
verses.5: Amah en unla, maitai un; tua hileh na mai uh zum ngei lo ding hi.
verses.6: Hih mi hehpihhuai pa kiko-in, Topa in amah za a, ama haksatna khempeuh panin amah a hon khia hi.
verses.7: Amah a zahtakteʼ kiimah Topaʼ vantungmi in giahphual sat a, amaute a hon khia hi.
verses.8: Topa tawh kikhawl phot unla, ama hoihna thei un! Amah a beel mite mi lungdam ahi uh hi.
verses.9: Ama mi siangthote aw, Topa zahtak un; bang hang hiam cih leh amah a zahtak mite in kitangsapna nei lo hi.
verses.10: Humpinelkai khanglaite in kisapna le gilkialna thuak a, ahih hangin Topa a zongte in na hoih a kisap uh om lo hi.
verses.11: Tate aw, hong pai unla hong ngai un; Topa zahtakna thu kong hilh ding hi.
verses.12: Nopna a neih theih nadingin nuntakna le khansau a deih kua ahi hiam?
verses.13: Siat nading panin na leii kem inla, zuaugenna panin na muk kem in.
verses.14: Siatna panin kihem khia inla, a hoih bawl in. Kilem nading hanciam inla, na phak mateng delh in.
verses.15: Topaʼ mit in thuman miteʼ lam en a, amauʼ kikona lamah a bil a ngat hi.
verses.16: Siatna a bawl mite hih leitung panin a kiphawkna a kisuk tat nadingin Topa in amaute a langpang hi.
verses.17: Huhna a ngen dingin thumante a kiko ciangin Topa in za a, a haksatna khempeuh panun amaute a hon khia hi.
verses.18: Lungsim kitamzante kiangah Topa hong om a, lungsim zan gawpte a hon hi.
verses.19: Thuman miʼ thuakna a tam mahmah hangin tuate khempeuh panin Topa in amah a hon hi.
verses.20: Amah in thuman mipa kem a, a guh khat zong kitan lo hi.
verses.21: Siatna in migilote that dinga, thuman a mudah mite gim kipia ding hi.
verses.22: Topa in ama nasemte hon khia a, amah a beel mi khat beek gim kipia lo ding hi.
